abstract: Nancy F Koehn Off the Shelf column reviews book Keynes Hayek: The Clash That Defined Modern Economics by Nicholas Wapshott.
snippet: In “Keynes Hayek: The Clash That Defined Modern Economics,” Nicholas Wapshott looks back at the two economists whose work has shaped much of the current debate about capitalism.
lead_paragraph: In “Keynes Hayek: The Clash That Defined Modern Economics,” Nicholas Wapshott looks back at the two economists whose work has shaped much of the current debate about capitalism.

headline.main: The Tale of the Dueling Economists
headline.print_headline: The Tale of the Dueling Economists
headline.seo: ‘Keynes Hayek’ Views Origins of an Economics Debate — Review
